problem_text: I want to understand how different foods affect my daily energy levels
I struggle with cravings and don't know how to manage them effectively
I want to make healthy food taste amazing but don't know where to start
I need to learn to recognize my body's hunger and fullness signals better
I'm a teen who wants to eat healthier but my parents buy all the food
I eat emotionally when stressed and want to develop better coping strategies
I need to handle office food culture while maintaining my health goals
I want to use my lab results to customize my nutrition approach
I want to optimize my brain function and focus through advanced nutrition strategies
